item.title: Detecting demand outliers in transport systems
item.description: I recently completed my PhD at STOR-i CDT at Lancaster University. My thesis was titled “Detecting demand outliers in transport systems” and here I’ll (try to) give a brief overview of the work I’ve done in the last three years. The final version of my thesis can be found here. Super happy to announce that this morning I passed my PhD viva with no corrections. ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰Thank you to my examiners Dr.
